name: Frog's Adventure to Home
description:
A frog wanted to go home, but it was far away from its home. Help the frog going home by choosing the right choice and avoid danger.

Features

  • Simple original blocky graphics
  • 5+ events
  • Narrative events
  • Narrative game over
  • Trap choices
  • Humor events
  • Unexpected events
  • Sequence of pages to simulate animation

How to play

  • Choose a correct choice to proceed
  • Wrong choice may lead to game over

Requirement

  • A PDF reader (Recommended: Foxit Reader)

Changelog

    • Fixed changelog date for v1.0.1 (That was my time zone which is
      UTC+7).
    • Added forgotten changelog for v1.0.1.
    • Added more info for document properties.
    • Fixed typo.
  • v1.0.1 (April 12th, 2016, GMT)
    • Replaced name since I used different one before.
    • Changed version position.
    • Fixed some typoes.
  • v1 (January 3rd, 2015, GMT)
    • Game is released.
